title: 【3.10.8.5更新】Nelson Sexton惨遭英语作文迫害|然而玩家名的限制终于少了
author: Sakura小樱花
txt_content:
然而这里的一只樱花又回来了
咳咳，虽然说没有抢到头条什么的XD
貌似机翻会很悲惨【←】所以我来再发布原创翻译好了OuO






3.10.8.5更新内容~
公告-Nelson Sexton

哈喽【标准开头XD】

如果你对正在测试的Unturned感兴趣，你可以打开你的Steam游戏库右键点击Unturned，选择属性，找到“测试”栏，输入代码“OPERATIONMAPLELEAF”体验测试版的Unturned哟~




更新内容：


添加：
满月的时候将会出现图标僵尸BOSS的眼睛会发光


改进：
改善动物的性能表现通过移除各种限制来使玩家名更多样化


调整：
调高了几种枪械对动物的伤害值调低皮质上衣/裤子所需的皮革数量调低了超间距在创意工坊中使用订阅下载


修复：
修复使用其他弹夹来填补空弹夹时出现的问题修复在僵尸生成区域重置僵尸BOSS的问题修复了动物会造成性能大幅度下降的可笑问题修复了在某种特定情况下读取数据时会崩溃的问题修复了某些掉落的物品无法拾取的问题



作者的话：
  明天我会有一场最具挑战性的考试：英语作文！只要通过这个测验，我就不需要学太多东西也可以获得进步了23333



原文：

Hello! 
If you're interested in testing out this upcoming update head on over to the Preview branch! You can gain access by right clicking on Unturned in your Steam library, selecting properties, navigating to the Betas tab and entering the secret passcode "OPERATIONMAPLELEAF". 
Additions: 
 Added icon when the full moon is out.
 Added glowing eyes to hyper zombies. 
Improvements: 
 Improved animal performance. 
 Improved name variety by removing restrictions. 
Tweaks: 
 Tweaked several gun damages higher against animals.
 Tweaked leather required to make shirt/pants lower. 
 Tweaked hyper pitch reduction a bit lower. 
 Tweaked workshop download to use subscribing.
 Fixes: 
 Fixed refilling completely empty magazines with other magazines.
 Fixed resetting mega zombie when generating a zombie region. 
 Fixed ridiculous issue with animals causing big performance drop.
 Fixed crash when reading data in specific case. 
 Fixed lack of leeway for picking up items that fell a bit. 

Tomorrow is the most challenging of my exams: English essay writing! Once that's over with I won't need to study so much and progress will ramp up. 
 Thanks for reading!
